hero.title: Lunier Marina
hero.subtitle: Exceptional Marine Luxury
hero.description: This is where comprehensive yacht management services come into play, ensuring that owners can enjoy their time at sea and leave the complexities of operations and logistics to the professionals.

relationship_section.title: Upcoming service monitoring
relationship_section.description: This section of our management app allows you to view when services are due. The colors change automatically according to due dates for annual service for your yacht. You will also receive a notification 2 months prior so arrangements can be made by our service team and when the service is due!

about.title: Exceptional Marine Luxury
about.description: In a fast-paced world, luxury yachts remain a sanctuary for tranquility and distinction. Owning a yacht is no longer just a pleasure; it has become a complex asset requiring precise management. This is where Lunier Marina comes in, offering you an unparalleled experience that combines absolute luxury with professionalism, ensuring you enjoy every moment aboard your yacht while leaving all the details to us.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Lunier Marina?
why_choose_us.experience_desc: We are a trusted company in the yacht management sector. Our team includes highly competent yacht managers experienced in complex operations. Our distinguished relationships with leading professionals in the sector, from brokers and marine engineers to insurance experts, ensure a seamless experience and optimal results at every stage of your yacht's lifecycle.
why_choose_us.service_desc: Our philosophy is built on establishing long-term relationships with our clients. We believe that a successful partnership requires us to consistently exceed your expectations and meet your requirements at any time. By deeply understanding your needs and preferences, we offer a personalized service that makes you feel like the most important partner in our journey.
why_choose_us.privacy_desc: We understand the importance of privacy for yacht owners and their guests. We handle all sensitive information related to yacht ownership, itinerary plans, and guests with the utmost confidentiality and professionalism, ensuring the privacy of our esteemed clients and VIPs.

services.title: Our Services Package
services.management_title: Comprehensive Yacht and Boat Management (360 Degree)
services.management_desc: We offer a complete solution for managing your yacht or boat, covering all operational, technical, and financial aspects. From crew supervision and periodic maintenance to budget management and compliance with maritime laws, we handle everything. You can also choose a modular approach that allows you to select only the services you need.
services.agency_desc: We welcome visiting yachts to the coasts of Saudi Arabia and facilitate all necessary procedures to ensure smooth arrival and comfortable departure. We take care of entry permits, customs clearance, and providing all required documentation, allowing you to focus on enjoying the beauty of the Red Sea.
services.marina_title: Management and Operation of Marinas and Yacht Clubs
services.marina_desc: We manage marinas according to the highest international standards, providing a safe and luxurious environment for yacht and boat docking. We also manage yacht clubs that offer recreational services and exclusive amenities for yacht and boat owners, using modern technology to make them an ideal destination for relaxation and networking.
services.crew_desc: We understand that the right crew is the foundation of an exceptional experience. Our recruitment team selects candidates with extreme care to ensure they match your unique requirements in terms of skill and personality. You can trust that every member of our crew is qualified, experienced, and ready to provide the highest levels of service.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.performance_desc: We go beyond luxury, blending quality, safety, into every voyage so you enjoy the sea with complete peace of mind, backed by standards & transparent reporting.
commitment.quality_desc: We enforce rigorous inspection routines, detailed checklists, and rapid-response protocols so your yacht stays in peak condition so each passage remains calm & secure.
commitment.environment_desc: We choose sustainable materials, limit emissions across every route, and train each crew on responsible practices so the sea you enjoy today stays pristine for tomorrow.
commitment.confidentiality_desc: Owner, guest, and itinerary details stay protected with strict discretion before, during, and after every journey, so your privacy and trust remain uncompromised.

team.title: Our Team
team.heart_desc: Our greatest strength is teamwork. We work directly with our clients; every yacht manager is supported by a complete team of technical management, accounting, and recruitment to provide robust and responsive service. We constantly share information to ensure every yacht runs smoothly.
team.passion_desc: Lunier Marina is not just a company; it is a team of passionate and dedicated individuals who put their passion at the core of everything they do. Every member of our team, from managers to engineers and technicians, works as your partner to ensure every aspect of your yacht is managed to perfection. We are here to ensure your yachting experience exceeds all expectations.
team.integrated_desc: Our team consists of experts in yacht management, engineering, and crew recruitment. We work as an extension of your own team to ensure every aspect of your yacht is managed to perfection.
team.development_desc: We are always looking for passionate individuals to join us. We believe that people make the difference, and we provide them with opportunities to develop and grow in a rewarding career in the yachting world.
team.crew_selection_desc: We carefully select the right crew who not only possess the required skills but also have the personality that matches your preferences, ensuring a distinguished experience aboard your yacht.

testimonials.title: Don't take it from us, hear it from our users

careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join Us or Collaborate With Us
careers.description: If you are passionate about the yachting world and strive for excellence, Lunier Marina is your destination. We are always looking for exceptional talent to join our growing team. Join us and participate in shaping the future of marine hospitality in the Kingdom.

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.subtitle: Together Towards Excellence
partnerships.description: We welcome partnerships with leading companies in the sector, from marine designers and engineers to global suppliers. We believe that collaboration is the key to success, and we strive to build strong relationships that benefit all parties to provide the best services to our clients.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: What's often asked about
faq.description: Answers to the questions we hear most often from yacht owners and captains planning their next season.

1.question: What does full-service yacht management include?
1.answer: We coordinate maintenance schedules, crew management, provisioning, compliance paperwork, and voyage support so you can focus entirely on your guests.

2.question: Can you assist with insurance and registration?
2.answer: Our compliance desk keeps every registry, flag, and insurance document current and handles renewals ahead of deadlines to avoid delays at port.

3.question: Do you operate across different regions?
3.answer: Yes, our captains and partner shipyards span the Mediterranean, Gulf, and Indian Ocean corridors to make seasonal repositioning effortless.

4.question: How do you maintain safety standards on board?
4.answer: We follow ISM and ISPS guidelines, conduct regular drills with your crew, and track every inspection digitally for full transparency.

5.question: Is support available outside office hours?
5.answer: A dedicated duty manager is reachable 24/7 for routing changes, technical incidents, or concierge requests.

contact.title: CONNECT US
contact.subtitle: Send us a message and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.interest: What are you most interested in?
contact.note: WE'LL GET BACK TO YOU WITHIN 24 HOURS.

placeholders.interest: Tell us about the voyage or service you need help with.

yachtApp.headline: Manage Your Yacht Anytime, Anywhere.
yachtApp.description: Experience seamless control over your vessel with our proprietary application. From crew scheduling to real-time expense tracking, everything is at your fingertips.
yachtApp.testimonial: "The most intuitive yacht management app I've ever used. It has completely streamlined our operations."

overlay.title:
Our App Is
Under Development
overlay.subtitle: We're crafting the ultimate yacht management experience. Be the first to know when we launch.

hero.label: Premium Yacht Management
hero.title: Yacht app: The ultimate yacht monitoring
hero.description: Imagine being able to monitor your yacht or boat from anywhere in the world right from your fingertips. Our proprietary management app is now the ultimate tool for yacht owners not only in our direct fleet of managed vessels but across the country to stay updated on maintenance, upkeep, service, photos, and vessel information!

tankLevels.title: View your Tank levels
tankLevels.description: Have the ability to view your current tank levels from anywhere! Our team and captains update these levels after each visit and outing! You will receive a notification that this was updated!

checklist.title: Stay updated with our custom checklist
checklist.description: A Lumière Marina team member will visit the boat and build out a completely custom checklist. This includes, exterior detailing, interior detailing, sea strainers, full systems check, hours and much more! This is updated each week by our team or your crew!

services.title: Upcoming service monitoring
services.description: This section of our management app allows you to view when services are due. The colors change automatically according to due dates for annual service for your yacht. You will also receive a notification 2 months prior so arrangements can be made by our service team and when the service is due!

q1.question: How does this information get to the app?
q1.answer: This is a great question. When a Lumière Marina team member visits the boat, we update tank levels, submit the checklist and upload photos for the owner. This happens instantly once we hit submit! The rest of the information is input by our yacht managers as well as our administrative team as needed.

q2.question: Can I request crew for my boat?
q2.answer: Yes! You absolutely can. In the 'crew/ make ready' section of the app you can request a captain, stewardess or deckhand. You can add a date and time and provide trip details in the notes section. We will then accept the request when crew is placed. You also have the ability to select 'make ready' for the owner operators who want to show up to a fully ready boat!

q3.question: What other information does the app hold?
q3.answer: This app is truly limitless when it comes to information. We upload vessel documents (hurricane plans, insurance COI's, registrations etc) all with expiration dates and notifications. We also store useful information like vessel specs, system information, USCG safety items and locations!

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to work together? We'd love to hear from you.
